title: 1978 Kenworth W900A Water Tanker Truck
item_description:
1978 Kenworth W900A Water Tanker Truck

Specifications

  • Year: 1978
  • Make: Kenworth
  • Model: W900A
  • VIN: 165914S
  • License:Â 6A00042 (not included/lost)
    • Registration Expiration: 10/31/2001
    • Planned Non-Op
  • Odometer Reads: 804,345
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 52,000
  • Transmission: Manual
  • Tire Size: 11R24.5
  • Diesel fuel

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Brown and Yellow
  • Doors: Two Door
  • No Brakes
  • Needs to be pushed to start
  • Air compressor not working

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Seller purchased this truck in 2018, but did not transfer it into their name, they have the original signed title. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
